name: Double Means Trouble!
description:
Hi! It's been a while hasn't it? This is a little snippet of a game I am developing. All instructions and rules are in game. I would recommend playing the levels first and free play second. Sorry if free play isn't the best or has a few bugs, I am still a little new to procedural generation. Press escape to return to the main menu, from which you can quit or play the game.

BTW, the windows version triggers windows' antivirus and warns you it doesn't recognise the file or owner and it could be a virus. It is not. I promsie.
